Get the latest trendy look with our Brazilian Straight Remy Ombre Hair! This Hair is Soft ,Gorgeous and sure to turn Heads!..

It can be treated as if it is your own hair, it can be washed, cut, straightened, dyed, shampooed, conditioned, blowdryed, moisturized, curled and styled as desired to create a completely undetectable, natural, comfortable and stylish look within minutes. The texture of Brazilian Hair is pretty close to average African American Grade Hair. This is Unprocessed Remy Virgin Hair.
With good maintenance, the hair can be used several times over and over again, lasting up to 1 year!

name: Malaysian Body wave
description:
malaysian hair is a very popular option among celebrities. at first can appear excessively shiny but after the first few washes then shine lessens to take a more natural appearance. curls would not loosen or drop and will last an entire day.  No product is required to maintain the curl. AVOID using oil spray as it will make the hair very shiny and give it a "wiggy" synthetic look. Malaysian hair is also softer and silkier than indian hair . The hair also blends well with most hair types including African Americans.

name: U Part Wig Making Service (Please Read Description below)
description:
We can make U part wigs for you! 

If you are purchasing the hair from us ask for your 30% discount code. 

Basic U-Part Wig:  middle part location with snap combs. ( You may choose how big you want your U-Part opening . (3x3inch/2.5x3inch/1.5x3inch) large, medium or small . 


Custom U-Part Wig: You have the option to choose your part location (left or right side) You can choose how big you want your U-Part opening to be, You can choose whether you want snap combs, You can use 3-6 bundles of hair , you can add a closure & make it a full wig,  you have the option to be able to wear in high ponytail. 

Once you finish paying for your U-part service PLEASE CONTACT
